name: Sarah Jenkins
longDescription: Sarah has over 10 years of experience helping children overcome reading challenges using structured, multisensory techniques. She works closely with schools to ensure consistent support.

name: Mindful Minds Clinic
longDescription: Our clinic focuses on helping children and teens with ADHD develop crucial executive functioning skills, time management, and emotional regulation strategies in a highly supportive environment.

name: Dr. Ahmed Tariq
longDescription: Dr. Tariq provides comprehensive developmental assessments and play-based therapy for children on the autism spectrum. He emphasizes family involvement to build a holistic support system at home.

name: Speak Easy Therapy
shortDescription: Helping children find their voice with confidence.
longDescription: Speak Easy Therapy offers evidence-based interventions for articulation, expressive language delays, and stuttering. Our interactive sessions make learning fun and engaging for early years learners.

name: Horizons Occupational Therapy
shortDescription: Developing fine motor and sensory processing skills.
longDescription: We help children develop the physical and cognitive skills necessary for daily activities. Our sensory-rich gym provides the perfect environment for addressing sensory processing disorders and dyspraxia.

name: Bright Sparks Tutoring
shortDescription: Tailored academic support for diverse learners.
longDescription: Bright Sparks offers individualized tutoring plans for children who need extra time and different approaches to grasp standard curriculum concepts, particularly in foundational math and literacy.
